ca.bc.webarts.widgets
Class Splash

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  ca.bc.webarts.widgets.Splash
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
public class Splash
extends java.awt.Frame
implements java.lang.Runnable

Splash is a Application Opening splash screen. It provides an expandable API for its use as a generic Splash, allowing the user to specify the graphic to use as well as the message to put up.

See Also:
